price: 59. Jésus est, pour Allah, tel Adam qu’Il créa de terre puis à qui Il dit : « Sois ! » et il fut.
arabic: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna mathala ʿīsā ʿinda al-lahi kamathali ādama khalaqahu min turābin thumma qāla lahu kun fayakūnu
